worldname.desc: The name to use for the server.

worldseed.desc: The seed to use for a new world. Set to 0 to generate random seed.

gameid.desc: Game ID to use for the server. Needs to be at least 28 characters and alphanumeric, excluding Y,y,x,0,O. Empty or not valid means a new ID will be generated at start.

datapath.desc: Save file location. If not set it defaults to a subfolder named "DedicatedServer" at the default Core Keeper save location.

maxplayers.desc: Maximum number of players that will be allowed to connect to server.

worldmode.desc: Sets the world mode for the world. Can be Normal (0), Hard (1), Creative (2), Casual (4). NOTE: Changing between Creative and non-Creative worlds not currently supported.

port.desc: What port to bind to. If not set, then the server will use the Steam relay network. If set, the clients will connect to the server directly and the port needs to be open.

ip.desc: What IP to bind the server to

season.desc: Overrides current season by setting to any of None (0), Easter (1), Halloween (2), Christmas (3), Valentine (4), Anniversary (5), CherryBlossom (6), LunarNewYear (7). -1 is default setting where it is set depending on system date. You can use either the season name or the corresponding number.

install.text:
#!/bin/bash

xvfbpid=""
ckpid=""
tailpid=""
greppid=""
installdir="$(dirname -- "$0";)"
exepath="$installdir/CoreKeeperServer"
requirements=( "libxi6" "xvfb" )
shutdown_command="shutdown"

sudo="sudo" && [[ $(id -u) == 0 ]] && sudo=""
function kill_corekeeperserver {
	if [[ ! -z "$ckpid" ]]; then
		kill $ckpid
		wait $ckpid
	fi
	if [[ ! -z "$xvfbpid" ]]; then
		kill $xvfbpid
		wait $xvfbpid
	fi
	if [[ ! -z "$tailpid" ]]; then
		kill $tailpid
		wait $tailpid
	fi
	if [[ ! -z "$greppid" ]]; then
		kill $greppid
		wait $greppid
	fi
	exit
}

function shutdown_server {
	echo "Shutting down server..."
	kill_corekeeperserver
}

trap kill_corekeeperserver EXIT

for r in "${requirements[@]}"

do
	echo "Checking for required package: $r"
	if ! (dpkg -l $r >/dev/null); then
		echo "Installing missing package: $r"
		sleep 1
		$sudo apt-get update -yy && $sudo apt-get install -yy "$r"
	fi
done

set -m

rm -f /tmp/.X99-lock

Xvfb :99 -screen 0 1x1x24 -nolisten tcp &
xvfbpid=$!

rm -f GameID.txt

chmod +x "$exepath"

DISPLAY=:99 LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$installdir/../Steamworks SDK Redist/linux64/" \
"$exepath" -batchmode -logfile CoreKeeperServerLog.txt -world ${world} -worldname "${worldname}" -worldseed ${worldseed} -gameid "${gameid}" -datapath "${datapath}" -maxplayers ${maxplayers} -worldmode ${worldmode} -port ${port} -ip ${ip} -season ${season} "$@" &

ckpid=$!

echo "Started server process with pid $ckpid"

while [ ! -f GameID.txt ]; do
	sleep 0.1
done

echo "Game ID: $(cat GameID.txt)"

tail -f $installdir/CoreKeeperServerLog.txt | grep "^[userid:[0-9]*] player" &
tail_and_grep_pid=$(ps -ho pgid $!)
pids=$(pgrep -ag $tail_and_grep_pid)
tailpid=$(echo "$pids" | awk 'NR==1{print $1}')
greppid=$(echo "$pids" | awk 'NR==2{print $1}')

while true; do
	read -p "" command
	if [ "$command" == "$shutdown_command" ]; then
		shutdown_server
	fi
done
